calculations.name: Obligor Mapping Parent
calculations.tableau_expression:
case [Obligor Mapping]


when "Province of Alberta Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of British Columbia Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Manitoba Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of New Brunswick Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Newfoundland Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Nova Scotia Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Ontario Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Prince Edward Island Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Quebec Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Saskatchewan Bonds" then "Province"

else [Obligor Mapping]

end

when "Province of Prince Edward Island Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Quebec Bonds" then "Province"
when "Province of Saskatchewan Bonds" then "Province"

else [Obligor Mapping]

end
